message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I am offering it to you for $1500000. This is a special introductory price, and I am confident it represents an excellent opportunity for you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding of the product's value. In light of your offer, I am proposing a counteroffer of $1400000. This price reflects a balance between the product's worth and your budget considerations.

Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a counteroffer of $1300000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your budget constraints. In response to your counteroffer, I am proposing a price of $1350000. This amount reflects a slight compromise while still ensuring a reasonable profit margin for me.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more offer of $1290000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm ready to make a deal.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I've considered your latest offer carefully, and I am willing to accept a price of $1325000 for the product. This price allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement while maintaining a reasonable profit margin for me.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more offer of $1295000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm ready to make a deal.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your budget constraints. In response to your latest offer, I am willing to accept a price of $1310000 for the product. This price allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement while still ensuring a reasonable profit margin for me.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I've reached my budget limit and can't go any higher. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'm making a final offer of $1290000. If you're willing to accept this price, I'm ready to make a deal.
